The fiscal data include budgetary central government units but do not include extrabudgetary funds. The fiscal year begins in April.

SACU receipts consist of external trade and excises on imported goods as well as a development component derived from excise taxes.
The non-mineral primary balance is computed as the difference between non-mineral revenue and expenditure (excluding interest
payments and receipts, which are roughly proxied by BoB transfers and interest).
